Code

PyNeuron Toolbox | Some functions to augment NEURON simulations in Python. Click here to see a rendered example.


HiddenMarkovModel.jl | Fitting Hidden Markov Models in Julia. I also implemented some simpler code for fitting discrete HMMs.


NonNegLeastSquares.jl | Nonnegative least-squares solvers in Julia.
